WorkItem.Description:
In 9.1.1, my compiler keeps going into a state where it flags bogus errors everywhere, including in lib.d.ts.  For example:

Error	2	Generic type references must include all type arguments.	lib.d.ts	397	43 stuartscode.ts
Error	3	Generic type references must include all type arguments.	lib.d.ts	397	43 stuartscode.ts
(it finds pages of these errors in lib.d.ts)
WorkItem.Summary: Compiler flagging errors in lib.d.ts and other code believed to be correct
